mahath anduru athi rathriyehi yam mahath ginikandak ho weda, rathri aluyam kalayehi pahawa giyawu wassa athi duruwu walakul athi ahasehi yam osadhi (pahan) tharakawak ho weda, me warna deka athuren kawara nam warnayak wada babalanneth, wada usas wanneth weda?´´ ´´swamini, rathri balawath wassa athi aluyam kalayehi duruwu pahawu walakul athi ahasehi yam osadhi (pahan) tharakawak weda, meya me ubhaya warnayangen wada yahapath wanneth wada usas wanneth weyi.´ ´´udayiya, ee kumakayi hanginnehida, rathri aluyam kalayehi duruwu wassa athi pahawu walakul athi ahasehi yam pahan tharuwak ho edawashi pohoya athi pasaloswakhi duruwu pahawu walakul athi ahasehi sampurna ada ra wassa athi kalayehi yam punsandak weda, me warna deka athuren kawara warnayak wada babalanneth, wada usas wanneth weda?´´8. ´´swamini, yam me edawashi pohoya athi pasaloswakhi duruwu giyawu wassa athi, pahawu walakul athi ahasehi sampurna ada ra kalayehi punsanda weda, meya me warna deka athuren wada babalanneth, wada usas wanneth weyi.´´ ´´ udayiya, ee kumakayi hanginnehida, edawashi pohoya athi pasaloswakhi duruwu giyawu wassa athi, pahawu walakul athi, ahasehi sampurna ada ra kalayehi yam punsandak ho weda, wasi kalaye anthima masaya wana sarath kalayehi duruwa giyawu wassa athi, pahawu walakul athi ahasehi sampurna iramudun kalayehi yam suyryayeth ho weda, me warna deka athuren kawara warnayak wada babalanneth, wada usas wanneth weda?´´´´swamini, yam me wasi kalaye anthima masaya wana sarath kalayehi duruwa giyawu wassa athi, pahawu walakul athi ahasehi sampurna iramudun kalayehi suyryaya weda, eya me warna deka athuren wada babalanneth, wada usas wanneth weyi.´´9. ´´udayiya, me sanda hiru dedenagen aalokaya nolaba thama sharirayenma mitada wada aalokamathwu dewiyo boho weth.
